description: Super versatile pants that keep you cool and comfy. Made from a rugged yet lightweight cotton, nylon blend, they wear well, pack small and shed wrinkles. Technical pattering and construction give you freedom of movement to grab a ride share bike or take the stairs two at a time.Dagan™ stretch poplin blends cotton and quick-drying nylon with just enough spandex for stretch.Anatomical patterning, articulated knees and a gusseted crotch improve comfort and freedom of movement.Snap-up rear pockets, dual front hand pockets and zippered side pockets have room for your EDC kit.Regular fit.
name: Arc'teryx Stowe Pants - Men's
